meanings.definition: Done or made with haste; quick or hurried.
meanings.sent1: She made the hastiest decision to leave early.
meanings.sent2: The hastiest route to the store is through the shortcut.
meanings.sent3: His hastiest attempt at cooking resulted in burnt toast.
meanings.sent4: The hastiest runner in the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent5: The hastiest squirrel gathered nuts before the storm.

meanings.definition: Acting or done with excessive speed or urgency.
meanings.sent1: The hastiest response to the emergency saved lives.
meanings.sent2: The hastiest worker finished the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: Her hastiest packing led to forgetting important items.
meanings.sent4: The hastiest wind blew away the loose papers on the desk.
meanings.sent5: The hastiest decision made by the team turned out to be the best one.
